column1: The Pit Room////VERY YUMMY and fun southern comfort food joint in Houston. The pulled pork and brisket tacos were amazing
column2: and the meat was so juicy and flavorful. One of my favorite parts of the restaurant was the help yourself pickled bar station
column5: pickled carrots and much more! This is an amazing place to come with family and friends
column6: as there is lots of outdoor seating with lights and a lovely patio.
